availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Stevenson (Carroll County and Owen County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer and farm laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Permelia Stafford Stevenson in Owen County, Kentucky, in March 1837. Father of James C. Stevens, Martha A. Stevenson, William Stevenson, Daniel Stevenson, Elizabeth Stevenson, Cornelius Stevenson, July Ann Stevenson, Nancy E. Stevenson, and John Stevenson. Farmer in Carroll County in 1850. Farm laborer in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 1, p. 184A.
Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 783-784.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film 000272772.
